projects.title: Biochemical Analysis of Different Varieties of Rice Under Salt Stress
projects.description: [Department of Agricultural and Food Engineering, IIT Kharagpur | Principal Investigator: Prof. Joydeep Banerjee]â€¢ Thoroughly analyzed the Impact of Salt stress in black and white rice genotypes at the physiological, biochemical and molecular levels â€¢ Efficiently estimated the total chlorophyll Fluorescence by OS-30p+ chlorophyll fluorometer, chlorophyll, and carotenoids by UVVis spectrophotometer of all 12 different varieties of rice. Various physical and chemical characteristics were used to differentiate them â€¢ Analysed the effects of salt stress on rice varieties, and their counter mechanism & also measured the total chlorophyll with 98% accuracy
